page.title: 08Religion
page.content: St Leonard's church is 700 years old.Its made out of sandstone and flint,and slates are on the spire.It has a cockeral weather vane on the top of the spire and it is made out of lead.There are marble grave stones and stones ones. The stained glass is held in by lead and it has attractive colours. There is a tomb with Daniell Family buried there.A metal cage surrounds the tomb.The lycht gate was built in 1885 and it's 100 years old and a coffin is laid on the top. Confetti is not allowed in the church yard.
